sub_title: Digital Conversion Optimization Expert at Philips
summary: I’m specialised in looking at website usage data, specifically at how consumers complete their goal on a website. I help the business translate this data in order to optimize customer satisfaction/NPS in the short and long term. I’m not afraid to question what’s already in place and operate with clear intent and a determined thoroughness. I thrive in team settings and am able to balance pragmatic thinking, sharing expertise and finding the perfect pun, meme or GIF for the occasion. Over the years I’ve been awarded many nicknames (Kennalytics is the most treasured of them all) and I will always promote team cohesion, sometimes blessing my cohort with its own tailor-made brand, slogan and logo.

profile_positions.description: In this role, I'm using data to measure the success of the Philips experience across consumer care channels for Personal Health products. I make extensive use of website data (Adobe Analytics) such as FAQ usage and support journey effectiveness and work with the QlikSense platform in order to connect all the data sources to create a clear picture for all stakeholders. In addition to web analytics, I use Social Media Care and Contact Center volume data accompanied by their respective NPS measurements in order to evaluate where we can make improvements and focus our next projects on. In short, I create stories using the vast amounts of data we have and make it accessible to my colleagues to create a better experience for our consumers.
profile_positions.title: Digital Analyst Consumer Experience

profile_positions.description:
I advised the highest segment of advertisers in the use of Third Party Ad Technologies on the Google Display Network. I was involved in certifying parties for the Ad Exchange (AdX), YouTube and AdWords products and specialised in the technologies used in the AdWords product. 

Day-to-day, I balanced one-off technical troubleshooting requests with mid to long term projects to finetune our Vendor team operations. Over the course of 2016, I had a big part in offshoring the majority of our incoming request volume and improving the processes our contractors follow.

•	Knowledge management: I created a resources platform for internal stakeholders. The platform was visited by over a quarter of our active user base every month, which lead to a 26% decrease in the number of one-off requests.

•	Process improvement: I reported on operational metrics using SQL, Google Sheets and Excel. By translating data into concrete actions, my efforts lead to the team's SLAs improving by 4.6% compared to the year before.
profile_positions.title: Ad Technology Specialist

profile_positions.description:
I provided advice to advertising agencies and the highest segment of SMB AdWords customers. My job consisted mainly of technical troubleshooting and providing advanced marketing solutions. I specialised in the Google Analytics and Tag Manager products, and was a well-versed generalist in the other products too.

• Quality Lead: I coached ten Online Specialists on their core performance. In addition, I trained two new coaches and set up a new data collection and reporting method.
I advised our SMB AdWords users on the online marketing solutions that Google offers. My core responsibilities were explaining product features, providing strategic marketing advice and increasing revenue by pitching advertising solutions.

• Customer Satisfaction Lead: I managed CSAT metrics for the Benelux market. I provided one-to-one coaching, developed a tool used by 100 Online Specialists and created three trainings of varying levels to 60 Online Specialists in total. As a result of my efforts, the market had its highest CSAT score to date in Q1 2015 (+1.3pp above target).

• AdWords Help Forum Lead: I worked together with Top Contributors on the Dutch forum to answer community queries. I also ran a knowledge management project that lead to a tripling of the number of questions asked and increased forum engagement by 24% compared to the year before.
profile_positions.title: Account Strategist

profile_positions.description:
During my internship I managed a large Customer Satisfaction project. Its  aim was to analyse effects of ringbacks using global data, launch a pilot and provide implementation recommendations. Additionally, I was involved in ads approval and took on the role of AdWords Help Center Lead. The latter entailed editing content of Dutch articles and (voice) recording  ten YouTube videos to help new users optimise their AdWords settings.

• All three markets involved in the pilot showed steady to dramatic increases, with the top performing market at a +68% increase.

• I hit all targets for ad approvals and exceeded expectations for the Help Center Lead role.
profile_positions.title: Online Media Associate Intern

profile_positions.description: In between my Bachelor's and Master's, I took on a full-time role as Treasurer of the study association in a board of six students. My main responsibilities were to take care of all financial matters within the association, which included bookkeeping and providing financial advice to Treasurers of all 17 committees. Throughout the year, I coordinated seven teams (of 3 to 8 students) that organised events for the association and I also shared responsibilities for promotion of the association and its activities.
profile_positions.title: Treasurer (full-time board member)

profile_positions.description: As a Link Marketeer, I optimised the organic search results of SMB clients' websites. By optimising the organic results (SEO), the website becomes more visible and it is more likely for a consumer to visit the company's website.
profile_positions.title: Link Marketeer
